definition: pasty (i.e. pastry stuffed with meat or vegetables)
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
KOIKE Yuriko (1952-), Japanese LDP politician, minister of defense during 2008

sentences.english: The process of embryonic germination was similar to zygotic embryoid but presented some abnormal embryoids.
sentences.chinese: 胚狀體萌發過程與合子胚相似，但出現了一些畸形胚。

sentences.english: The first division of the zygote is transverse. The embryogeny belongs to the Onagrd type.
sentences.chinese: 合子第一次分裂爲橫分裂，胚的發育屬柳葉菜型。

sentences.english: Certain autosomal translocations in the heterozygous state can be fully viable .
sentences.chinese: 呈雜合子狀態的某些常染色體易位完全可以生活的。

sentences.english: The patient′s mother was the carrier of the heterozygosis mutation in X-chromosome.
sentences.chinese: 患兒母親爲X染色體突變基因雜合子攜帶者。

sentences.english: Moreover, there had been homozygotes in the population.
sentences.chinese: 並且，種羣中已有抗性純合子個體存在。

sentences.english: The first division of zygote is transverse.
sentences.chinese: 合子第一次分裂爲橫裂，胚胎髮育爲柳葉菜型。

sentences.english: The Spirulina possesses only LDH1 composed of H subunit.
sentences.chinese: 螺旋藻僅有由H亞基構成的純合子LDH1。

sentences.english: When an organism is homozygous dominant, it has two dominant genes.
sentences.chinese: 當一個生物是顯性純合子時，它就有兩個顯性基因。

sentences.english: In intron 16 one site has transition heterozygote.
sentences.chinese: 在內含子16內有1個位點存在轉換型雜合子。

sentences.english: Frequency of compound heterozygosity was similar in both groups.
sentences.chinese: 兩組的對偶基因爲異型合子的發生頻率則相似。

sentences.english: The development of the embryoids is similar to that of the zygotic embryo.
sentences.chinese: “胚狀體”的發育與合子胚的發育過程相似。

sentences.english: After fertilization, the primary endosperm nucleus divides earlier than zygote .
sentences.chinese: 受精後，初生胚乳核分裂先於合子。

sentences.english: The propositus was a young man of Li ethnic group, belonging to heterozygote.
sentences.chinese: 先證者爲黎族男青年，屬雜合子。

sentences.english: Dormant stage of the zygote is about 15 days long, and then divided into a two-cell proembryo.
sentences.chinese: 合子休眠期爲15天左右，然後分裂形成二細胞原胚。

sentences.english: After fertilization through the micropyle, the zygote turned into dormancy status without certain time phase.
sentences.chinese: 成熟胚囊經珠孔受精後，合子休眠，休眠時間不確定。

definition: cleavage of fertilized ovum into cells
